questions.question_text: Which application delivers employees an omni-channel learning experience to enable timely access to the correct learning?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Correct answer is A, Record Producer.

Selected Answer: A
Record Producer is configured on the HR Service record.

questions.question_text: If an HR Service needs to be accessible to employees on the Employee Center, which field must be completed on the HR Service record?

choices.D: It combines Lifecycle Event cases and Journey Accelerator action plans.
choices.A: It tracks the progress of Lifecycle Events and onboarding cases using the dashboards.
choices.B: It passes information from the lifecycle event case to a child case or task
choices.C: It manages the dependencies of activities within an activity set.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D, correct answer.

questions.question_text: What is the purpose of Journey designer?
In the HR Guided Setup Module, why are some tasks locked in the Task view?

choices.C: They require other tasks to be completed first.
choices.B: They are deprecated tasks that should not be completed.
choices.A: They require an elevated role to access.
choices.D: They require a plugin to be activated first.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Page 34 implementation ebook: Some tasks may be locked because they require a plugin to be activated.

Both C and D are correct as per the documentation which states:
Lock icon
When it appears in front of an activity, task, or subtask, you cannot access the item. You may need to activate a plugin or complete a prerequisite task to unlock it.

questions.question_text: Which content delivery feature will allow a user to deliver messages to employees and invite them to a meeting where survey results will be shared?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Campaigns for content experience

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-employee-service-management/page/product/employee-center/concept/ecpro-campaigns.html
